# Opus

**Enumeration Case**

The Opus codec format.

## Declaration

```swift
Opus
```

## Discussion

This format uses no flags.

## Open-Source Formats

- **iLBC**: The internet Low Bitrate Codec (iLBC) narrowband speech format.
